question_text: Which two actions should be taken before using a tone generator and probe? (Select two)
answer_options: Verify the cable is not carrying voltage
Crimp new connectors onto both cable ends
Disconnect the cable from live network devices
Enable SNMP on the cable's switch port
correct_answer: Verify the cable is not carrying voltage
Disconnect the cable from live network devices
explanation: A tone generator should not be connected to live or powered lines. Disconnecting the cable and confirming no voltage protects the tool and user.
